title: The Day It Rained on Sugar Mountain: A Gumdrop Tale of Unity and Friendship
description: Sugar Mountain is a mysterious and special place, with many secrets to uncover. The group of people who live on Sugar Mountain are one of those secrets few have discovered. Rare and unique, these people live in a happy and harmonious community, where togetherness is a way of life.Until someone new arrives . . .
author: R.E.  Russell
